The Android Pay API will be used to make payments. To implement it, I will first add dependencies to gradle and make changes in manifest to support this function. Then, by using OnClickListener on pay icon, the intent will be sent to check whether the user has this function working. If everything is fine, I may use either gateway token approach or network token approach. Suppose, I use the second one. In order to do that I will acquire a key-pair used to encrypt the response from Android Pay. To request the wallet information, I will make a Masked Wallet Request in a payment button in WalletFragment. The Masked Wallet Response is received if the user has confirmed to pay with Android Pay. Lastly, the status of payment can be updated and presented in a new fragment/activity with the instructions on what to do next.
